#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a, int b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	int test,n,m,ans;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==1)
		ans=m;
		else if(m==1)
		ans=n;
		else if(n==m)
		ans=n;
		else
		ans=gcd(n-1,m-1)+1;
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
